channel.title: We should make HL3 after Black Mesa is completed if Valve won't make it.
channel.description:
Since they are so involved in Steam, and the hype is so extreme, I don't know if Valve will ever make HL3. When Black Mesa is completed in 2019, if Valve hasn't released it and we get their blessing, what if we set the next project to be Half-Life 3 to be completed by 2033?
I NEED CLOSURE, DAMMIT!
